title: 'Works well'

title: 'Works perfectly!'
body: 'Package contained the trimmer and the corking device. Both work perfectly. Trimmer is great for neatly getting the foil off the wine bottle.  The long needle goes easily into the cork

title: 'It appears great on photo. The product is not too sturdy'
body: 'Product metal appears light and bendy. Its not high grade material for the money you pay. Since its made in China so may just not last long . Their quality is low grade but sometimes you do get lucky.'

title: 'A bit more needed.'
body: 'A good quality product which would have been perfect if the cork screw would have been 6-7 mm longer. Then the full cork would be extracted easily. But other openers too suffer from the same shortcoming.'
